item.description:
Across the street from Sikorsky Air Craft Corp there is a little
Shopping Center.

Within the Shopping Centers are a few Restaurants.

This time I will be going to Stella's Italian Family Restaurant
For a quick bit to eat.

(There is nice & enjoyable Chinese Restaurant there but
I am not going there this time.)

I am not in Milford along the way to pick any one up.

My guest will probably meet me there.

Unfortunately, we know very well where Sikorsky's is.

Anyone else in the area is invited to drop by.

I will be heading there shortly after I send this Meet Up.

I do not have time to put this Meet Up within any more
Of my sites.

Enjoy your Sunday afternoon.

Mike B
item.how_to_find_us: Have a copy of Dahlonega Haunts with me

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: UZ has a Quick Bite to Eat At Stella's in Stratford
